channel.title: Bananas – Chow Down Orlando
channel.description: Exploring all that Orlando has to offer.

item.title: Bananas Diner
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
This is Daddy’s Burger from Bananas Diner. It’s topped with blue cheese, bacon, and caramelized onions (which, if you haven’t figured out by now, I’m a huge fan of). The burger itself was good, though, like most blue cheese burgers, I could have used more blue cheese. Also pictured are homemade chips, again, I’m a huge […]

The post Bananas Diner appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is Daddy’s Burger from Bananas Diner. It’s topped with blue cheese, bacon, and caramelized onions (which, if you haven’t figured out by now, I’m a huge fan of). The burger itself was good, though, like most blue cheese burgers, I could have used more blue cheese.

Also pictured are homemade chips, again, I’m a huge fan of. We tried both the cajun and ranch flavors and I enjoyed both.

Not pictured, but worth your time, are Banana’s milkshakes. They’re homemade, huge, and fantastic. I had the Happy Days, which is made from cookie dough ice cream and mini chocolate chip cookies. Crazy good.

One unique thing about Bananas, is that when the bill came, so did homemade banana flavored cotton candy. If you’re going to check out Bananas, make sure you bring an appetite.

Banans Diner can be found in the Mills/50 area, on Mills.

The post Bananas Diner appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
